Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
what kind of targeting is available?

Hey Ryan! There are several targeting options available for advertisers. One of the key options is Custom Audience targeting, which allows you to reach users who already know or have engaged with your business. This is great for retargeting and creating look-alike audiences. If you want more detailed information, check out our Audience Management guide here: [Introduction to Audience Management](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/26679465558669-Introduction-to-Audience-Management). Let me know if you have any other questions!
newsbreak sucks, im losing money. whats wrong

I'm really sorry to hear that you're having a tough time with your campaigns, Ryan. It might be helpful to look into why your ad campaigns are underperforming. Have you checked your targeting, ad creative, or bidding strategy? A/B testing can also help identify what works best for your audience. If you want more detailed guidance, I can share our Reporting Guide with you. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
i need to speak with someone
I've sent an email to our support team on your behalf, and they should reach out to you soon. If there's anything else you need in the meantime, just let me know!

whats the best event tracking platform

Hey there! The best event tracking platform really depends on your specific needs and goals. Some popular options include Google Analytics, RedTrack, and Voluum. Each has its own features and benefits, so it might be worth checking them out to see which one fits your requirements best. If you have a particular use case in mind, I can help narrow it down further!
why was my accounts charged?

I'm sorry to hear about the unexpected charge! Can you provide a bit more detail about the charge? For example, was it related to a subscription or an ad campaign? This will help me assist you better!
it happened on 1/31, my ads are off

Thanks for the info! It sounds like you might have encountered a temporary authorization fee, which is common when using ad platforms. If your ads are off and you were charged, it could be related to that. You can check your billing details or reach out to our support team for clarification. Would you like me to help you with that?
